name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: hadoop.security.group.mapping.ldap.num.attempts.before.failover
description:
This property is the number of attempts to be made for LDAP operations
    using a single LDAP instance. If multiple LDAP servers are configured
    and this number of failed operations is reached, we will switch to the
    next LDAP server. The configuration for the overall number of attempts
    will still be respected, failover will thus be performed only if this
    property is less than hadoop.security.group.mapping.ldap.num.attempts.

name: dfs.block.access.token.lifetime
description: The lifetime of access tokens in minutes.

name: dfs.datanode.max.nodes.to.report
description:
Number of nodes to include in JSON report. We will return nodes with
    the highest number of votes from peers.

name: dfs.namenode.reencrypt.edek.threads
description:
Maximum number of re-encrypt threads to contact the KMS
    and re-encrypt the edeks.

name: ipc.[port_number].decay-scheduler.period-ms
description:
How frequently the decay factor should be applied to the
    operation counts of users. Higher values have less overhead, but respond
    less quickly to changes in client behavior.
    This property applies to DecayRpcScheduler.

name: mapreduce.ifile.readahead.bytes
description: Configuration key to set the IFile readahead length in bytes.

name: dfs.namenode.edekcacheloader.initial.delay.ms
description:
When KeyProvider is configured, the time delayed until the first
    attempt to warm up edek cache on NN start up / become active.
